metadata.description: A massive, ornate structure built from gears and cogs as much as stone. Its clock face looms above the city like a cold, dead eye, as its mechanical heartbeat thunders out a steady drumbeat of doom.
metadata.atmosphere: Menacing, imposing, heavy with the weight of calculated cruelty
metadata.significance: The seat of the ruling Council's power, where dark magic is woven into the very fabric of the city's infrastructure.
